snippet: Three Afghan service personnel were killed on board the helicopter, which was parked inside Bagram Air Base.
abstract: Coalition heavy-transport helicopter parked inside Bagram Air Base is hit and destroyed by insurgent fire, killing three Afghan service members.

byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Bagram, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: Three Afghan service personnel were killed on board the helicopter, which was parked inside Bagram Air Base.

headline.main: NATO Copter Destroyed by Taliban at Base
headline.print_headline: NATO Copter Destroyed by Taliban at Base
